name: Avant Garde
description: Using the latest carpet-manufacturing technology, this Level Cut Loop (LCL) product, Avant Garde, adds a new dimension to hospitality carpeting. This striking checkerboard pattern and the array of contemporary colours provide the perfect match in creating modern elegance.SilverCare™ is a long-lasting protection system, with a base of non-toxic, hypoallergenic silver ions.

name: Baltimore
description: Baltimore – where great style meets cutting edge innovation! Baltimore offers the commercial flooring market a never seen before world of stylish options. Baltimore was specifically designed with the needs of the corporate and hospitality environments in mind. Baltimore is a densely constructed wall to wall carpet tile which features a unique yarn system that reduces surface “shading”. 100% SDX (Solution Dyed Nylon) fibres also provide excellent colour fastness and resistance to fading. With it’s international range of colourways Baltimore offers a colour option suited to a wide range of projects.SilverCare™ is a long-lasting protection system, with a base of non-toxic, hypoallergenic silver ions.

name: Bella Vista
description: Now, the timeless elegance of Italy is encapsulated in a stunning range of cut-pile carpets from Belgotex Floors. The Bella Vista range is the perfect choice for many areas in your home where you need an elegant quality affordable floorcovering that is also environmentally friendly, comfortable, healthy and resilient. Featuring six colourways that are inspired by the ancient cobblestone streets of Florence, the pale clear water cascading down a hundred fountains in Tivoli Gardens, the concrete Colosseum set against a grey-blue sky, and the ash grey stone of Pompeii, Bella Vista is the pure beauty of Italy brought into your home. The beautiful view…it’s all the inspiration you need to create a beautiful home.SilverCare™ is a long-lasting protection system, with a base of non-toxic, hypoallergenic silver ions.

name: Berberesque
description: Berberesque is a chunky and high-low looped carpet that comes in broadloom carpet. It is 9mm thick and is suited for a heavy residential installation.

name: Chianti
description: Chianti’s subtle and attractive colour array is an impeccable choice for your home!  This collection has the added advantage of being stain-resistant, making it one of the top ranges when looking for carpets.

name: Classique
description: Classique is tufted and carefully looped for durability, warmth and comfort. Available in seven rich colours, Classique is ideal for heavy residential use.

name: Cobble Ridge
description: Inspired by the many fibres that bind our lives and are woven into our past, present and future, Belgotex Floors has created the Cobble Ridge range of multilevel loop pile carpets. This family friendly carpet range is comfortable and durable, and available in a variety of colourways based on flax, coir, ramie, hemp, angora and wool – the textile fibres that are woven, spun, knitted or knotted into the colourful fabrics, blank canvases, natural linens and strong yarns that form an integral part of our lives. It is ideal for children’s bedrooms or playrooms, as well as high traffic areas in your home.Belgotex Floors’ exciting Cobble Ridge range…it makes the whole picture of your home beautiful and unique in ways you could never imagine.SilverCare™ is a long-lasting protection system, with a base of non-toxic, hypoallergenic silver ions.

name: Colour Rib
description: The uniqueness of Colour Rib is in the innovative fibre engineering combined with the superior production process, making this Belgotex Floorcovering product a timeless investment for the discerning homeowner. Colour Rib is specified for a number of unique features, namely; a supreme resistance to moisture and mould with anti-allergenic and anti-static properties.

name: Conqueror
description: This carpet is an excellent choice when selecting a practical, hard-wearing carpet for the home. Manufactured from 100% Stainproof Miracle Fibre (Polypropylene), Conqueror is available in a range of attractive colours.SilverCare™ is a long-lasting protection system, with a base of non-toxic, hypoallergenic silver ions.

name: Cottage Weave
description: Cottage Weave is a beautiful level looped carpet to invite even the hairy members of the family in. It is a heavy residential carpet made from 100% BCF Stain Shield fibres.

name: Country Craft
description: Country Craft is a beautiful, diverse collection, of gorgeous carpeting. This floorcovering will lend an earthy feel to any room, making it stylish and modern, with an ethnic flair!

name: Country Living
description: With the Country Living range of carpets, Belgotex Floors brings the beauty and peace of the countryside right into your home. Country Living is a low-level loop pile carpet with a Berber look. The neutral, natural colour tones of the range are inspired by the textures of country life – woven baskets filled with fresh herbs, the softness of a mohair blanket next to a log fire, a patchwork quilt spread across the wicker chair that you sit on to gaze out across the fertile open pastures. And with either a 5 or 10- year warranty you always have peace of mind when choosing a Belgotex Floors carpet.So when it comes to transforming your home into a comfortable, warm, country-inspired haven, there is no better choice than the Country Living range. It’s all about the joy of living.SilverCare™ is a long-lasting protection system, with a base of non-toxic, hypoallergenic silver ions.

name: Dazzle
description: This product imported from Belgium has a visually attractive design and texture, is a 100% polypropylene stain-safe, at an affordable price. This exclusive product is perfect for any room in your home whether you have children or animals it will suit your family’s needs.

name: Design Jewel
description: Design Jewel is a luxury woven, patterned cut pile carpet that brings a classic touch to any home or hospitality space. It is made from 100% PP B-Tron Stain Shield fibres.

name: Destiny
description: Destiny – There is no other fate for this fabulous foundation than the most luxurious and opulent of rooms in your home, be it your boudoir or your lounge. The super-soft, ultra-plush pile is toe-wrigglingly inviting, begging you to kick off your shoes and marvel at the comfort and warmth beneath your feet. And you’ll thank your lucky stars that the super-strong SDX Soft yarn with hygienic SilverCare anti-microbial treatment will provide a supremely stain-proof surface that will retain its good looks and charm through years of raising families, pets and guests.SilverCare™ is a long-lasting protection system, with a base of non-toxic, hypoallergenic silver ions.SDX Soft™ yarn combines the superior performance characteristics of stain-proof SDX with unbelievable softness.

name: Diplomat
description: Diplomat is a patterned, easy on the eyes and tough on dirt carpet highly recommended for lounges and bedrooms. It comes in broadloom, 50 x 50cm Enduroback KR4 tiles and 50 x 50cm Eco-back tufted cut pile.

name: Elegance
description: Elegance is a Saxony product, a dense, luxurious carpet that features closely packed, level cut piles. The Elegance range is offered in a beautiful palette of clean yet distinctive colours in beiges, browns and greys, and is perfect for more formal residential areas like living and dining rooms.So, if you’re looking for a chic, sophisticated floorcovering for your home, discover the natural distinction of our incredible Elegance range. It’s a refined taste in flooring. Pure and simple.SilverCare™ is a long-lasting protection system, with a base of non-toxic, hypoallergenic silver ions.

name: Essence
description: The latest SDX “soft” technology combined with exceptional stain, soil and colourfast properties, puts ESSENCE in a field of its own. With the vast colour palette and offering superior soft comfort underfoot, this affordable and lustrous cut pile carpet is guaranteed to enhance any residential interior.SilverCare™ is a long-lasting protection system, with a base of non-toxic, hypoallergenic silver ions.SDX Soft™ yarn combines the superior performance characteristics of stain-proof SDX with unbelievable softness.

name: Essex
description: Essex is an exceptionally versatile contract product that brings both style and durability to any project. Manufactured from tightly tufted 100% Stainproof Miracle Fibre, Essex is extremely easy to clean and maintain. Essex is backed with the advanced MiracleBac, making it non-allergenic and moisture resistant. This combination makes Essex an exceptionally hard-wearing commercial flooring product that will provide superior performance and long lasting good looks to your chosen project. The Essex range is available in a variety of beautifully coordinating colours.SilverCare™ is a long-lasting protection system, with a base of non-toxic, hypoallergenic silver ions.

name: Frivola
description: A soft luxurious touch in your room

name: Habitat
description: Inspired by the incredible ecological terrain on our planet, Belgotex Floors has launched the Habitat range of level loop pile carpets. Perfectly suited to high traffic areas like passages and TV rooms, Habitat is available in eight beautiful, neutral colourways. Now you can bring ‘Grassland’, ‘Mountain’, ‘Tundra’ and ‘Forest’ into your surroundings, along with some other stunning habitats. It’s a natural way to change your home into an amazing new abode.So, if you want your home to become an environment where you and the people you love can thrive, consider a Habitat carpet. Because Home is more than a space you inhabit…SilverCare™ is a long-lasting protection system, with a base of non-toxic, hypoallergenic silver ions.

name: Heather Twist
description: Heather Twist is an elegant, twist style of carpet, with texture that almost completely masks footprints, so it’s perfect for high-traffic areas like stairways, entrance halls and TV lounges. It is available in a sophisticated range of colours that tell of dark taupe crags, pale stone boulders and fawn, ochre and honey-coloured grass that stretches as far as the eye can see.Belgotex Floors’ Heather Twist carpet range gives you all the creative inspiration you need to turn your home into an incredible, visually evocative landscape…and the perfect setting for your own life story. The End.SilverCare™ is a long-lasting protection system, with a base of non-toxic, hypoallergenic silver ions.

name: Hollywood
description: Hollywood is a beautiful, diverse collection, of gorgeous carpeting. This floorcovering will lend an modern, but classic feel to any room.

name: Impressions
description: A classic design has been brought back to life, with added texture, through our revolutionary new level cut-loop technology. Impressions has a neutral colour palette, which provides the perfect foundation for any décor enthusiast. Made from 100% Stainproof SDX (Solution Dyed Nylon), Impressions is colourfast and bleach resistant, ensuring colour that lasts.SilverCare™ is a long-lasting protection system, with a base of non-toxic, hypoallergenic silver ions.

name: Kashmir
description: Kashmir is a beautiful carpet made from the finest fibres, luxurious colours and chucky looped textures. This 9.5mm thick berber adds a modern, elegant touch on the floor.

name: Luxury Wool Berber II
description: Luxury Wool Berber II is 100% pure wool. It’s a naturally attractive carpet, which is soft under foot and perfect for any room in your home. This range of carpets promises warmth and comfort for years to come.

name: Manhattan
description: Manhattan is one of our affordable ranges, made out of 100% BCF Nylon 6. Picture perfect and space-dyed, Manhattan is perfect for a modern home and happy family.

name: Origins
description: Crisp clean colourways reflect the latest décor trends and complement any interior by adding elegance to any room in the home. This loop-pile carpet is crush resistant to ensure hard-wearing good looks while its 100% Stainproof Miracle Fibre (Polypropylene) construction ensures easy cleaning and superb colourfastness. Origins is suitable for even the most demanding residential applications.SilverCare™ is a long-lasting protection system, with a base of non-toxic, hypoallergenic silver ions.

name: Paramount Twist
description: Paramount Twist, a charming, earthy collection to warm any room. This popular carpet is durable and stain-safe making this range a popular choice.

name: Portrait
description: Portrait paintings capture the spirit of the people they portray, and encapsulate the essence of who they are. Famous portraits – like Leonardo da Vinci’s ‘Mona Lisa’, Vermeer’s ‘Girl with a Pearl Earring’ and Van Gogh’s self-portraits – have been the inspiration for many great artists and designers through the centuries. And now, they have inspired Belgotex Floors to create ‘Portrait’, a new range of multilevel loop carpets that will stir the décor artist in you to express the essence and spirit of who you are.

name: Reflections
description: Crafted from the innovative SDX “soft” fibre technology, REFLECTION is a luxurious, aesthetically lustrous yet affordable, cut pile carpet. The combination of durability, outstanding performance and superior stain resistance together with the luxury of soft underfoot comfort, makes this range a perfect choice for the discerning homeowner.SilverCare™ is a long-lasting protection system, with a base of non-toxic, hypoallergenic silver ions.SDX Soft™ yarn combines the superior performance characteristics of stain-proof SDX with unbelievable softness.

name: Romeo
description: A soft luxurious touch in your room

name: Royal Twist
description: Offers a stately blend of sophistication, luxury and outstanding performance. Available in a selection of subtle neutral shades, the dense pile of Royal Twist offers superior comfort. Maintenance is easy too, thanks to stain-resistant 100% Stainproof SDX (Solution Dyed Nylon) construction which ensures that colours will not fade.SilverCare™ is a long-lasting protection system, with a base of non-toxic, hypoallergenic silver ions.

name: Serengeti
description: Serengeti is the perfect commercial flooring option for those projects requiring a touch of African flavour. The distinctive paw print pattern evokes memories of Africa’s unique natural heritage. Serengeti is a plush cut-pile industrial carpet that is ideally suited to heavy commercial use.The 100% Stainproof SDX (Solution Dyed Nylon) fibres that make up a Serengeti carpet provide superior colourfastness and resistance to carpet tile stains and soiling. Serengeti commercial carpets are extremely durable and easy to maintain. The Serengeti range is available in a variety of contemporary colourways that reflect the current décor trends.SilverCare™ is a long-lasting protection system, with a base of non-toxic, hypoallergenic silver ions.

name: Shaggy Exclusive Broadloom
description: Shaggy Exclusive is a super soft and comfortable ready-made carpet with super long pile threads. Available in five exquisite colours, the Shaggy adds a perfect finish in any room especially during winter’s cold days.

name: Silhouette Elite
description: Silhouette Elite is a beautiful, soft and luxurious carpet. It is imported from Belgium and is a must for any family room.  It’s the picture-perfect choice for comfort, style and beauty. It’s amazingly soft, and comes in a variety of natural colours.

name: Sorrento
description: Sorrento is a carefully cut tufts, available in colours suitable for both serenity and celebration. You can find bright blue and green for an extra bright tint in a room.

name: Stately Homes
description: A touch of elegance in your home

name: Stoneridge
description: And it is the allure of these exotic destinations that has inspired Belgotex Floors to create Stoneridge, a range of beautiful textured loop pile carpets that bring the world into your home. Stoneridge is a hardwearing, practical choice in floorcovering that is easy to clean and maintain. Choose African Smoke, Asian Jute, Egyptian Tweed, Greek Pottery, Italian Honey, Moroccan Berber, Romanian Arch, Spanish Guitar or Turkish Cotton, and add excitement and character to your bedrooms, lounges, dining areas and passageways.If you love a global look, or you’re just a wandering spirit seeking to bring the spirit of travel adventure into your home, look no further than Belgotex Floors’ Stoneridge range. We can show you the world.SilverCare™ is a long-lasting protection system, with a base of non-toxic, hypoallergenic silver ions.

name: Super Tweed II
description: Super Tweed II is a high-quality, durable collection of carpets. This range is perfect for most home, and office, flooring solutions. There are a variety of natural colours that are perfect for high traffic areas.

name: Superweave
description: Tufted on the only machine of its kind in Africa, Superweave is a unique product specifically aimed at the discerning décor fraternity. Superweave complements the latest trends in furnishings and fabrics with its sophisticated ‘woven’ look and contemporary colour range. Engineered to provide outstanding performance in heavy-residential installations, this dense, loop pile product highlights accent colours and creates a warm, relaxing ambience in any environment.SilverCare™ is a long-lasting protection system, with a base of non-toxic, hypoallergenic silver ions.

name: Tibet
description: Tufted and carefully looped to add serenity and comfort to your home, Tibet is suitable for heavy residential application and comes in broadloom.

name: Tiffany
description: Tiffany is the perfect high traffic, low maintenance solution. This durable and versatile carpet is a definite winner for any active family.

name: Timeless
description: Because we know there is so much value in things that are timeless, and because we believe in enduring quality products, Belgotex Floors has created the Timeless range of carpets, a multilevel loop product that is environmentally friendly, comfortable, healthy and easy to maintain. Timeless is durable and will retain its good looks in busy areas of your home, like children’s bedrooms and playrooms. In addition to these incredible attributes, this amazing carpet range is offered in a variety of exciting colour blends that will be music to your ears.There’s a saying that goes, ‘One old song. A thousand old memories.’ And when you choose Belgotex Floors Timeless carpet range for your home, you’re also choosing some beautiful new emories that one day will become your amazing, nostalgic past.

name: Top Berber
description: Top Berber is a highly-durable carpet which comes with a powerful and effective stain protection. This allows a little more time for those unexpected, accidental spills to be mopped up!  Comfortable yet practical, Top Berber is a definite must for any modern family.

name: Top Style
description: Top Style is the perfect high traffic, low maintenance solution. This durable and versatile carpet is a definite winner for any active family. This range comes with a high stain resistance shield, which protects the floor, for years to come.

name: Vogue
description: Belgotex Carpets, the world leaders in floor innovation, opens a bold new world of intensified colours in the latest, superior SDX “soft” fibre technology. Radically distinctive and without equal, VOGUE is an upmarket, luxurious, deep-pile carpet, offering the interior decorator or homeowner unsurpassed colour choice and quality with the indulgence of super soft underfoot comfort.SilverCare™ is a long-lasting protection system, with a base of non-toxic, hypoallergenic silver ions.SDX Soft™ yarn combines the superior performance characteristics of stain-proof SDX with unbelievable softness.

name: Weavecraft
description: Weave Craft is carefully looped together with a two-colour combination to create a warm, homely feel.

name: Weavers Choice
description: Belgotex Floorcoverings introduces WEAVERS CHOICE, a heavy commercial product that is available in a range of natural colourways. Chunky, traditional and expertly constructed, the look of Weavers Choice is charmingly rustic as it is commanding. Given the harmonious blend of rich colours and intriguing peppercorn texture, it’s no wonder Weavers Choice holds instant appeal to those who appreciate timeless craftsmanship and quality.

name: Westminster
description: True luxury for the corridors of power, Westminster takes commercial carpeting to new heights of comfort and sophistication. This elegant cut-pile carpet offers plush softness underfoot and provides superior sound-absorption properties.SilverCare™ is a long-lasting protection system, with a base of non-toxic, hypoallergenic silver ions.

name: Advanced
description: Advanced laminate floor is the perfect balance of quality and affordability. It is an economic rugged floor with proven 1 strip decor. Its synchronized, embossed grain and the matt surface shimmer give it an authentic structure and creates a warm, natural atmosphere. the four sided V-Groove contributes to the typical floorboard look and if you want, your ADVANCED floor can move around with you. It can be easily removed and re-installed somewhere else – even in small used commercial areas. Tried and tested ADVANCED delivers confidence.

name: Authentik AC4
description: Authentik AC4/32 V-groove range is perfectly suited for domestic and moderate commercial applications. Sophisticated and most advanced embossed surface, reflecting the true and deep texture of wood, with mat and shiny effects to give the feeling of natural wood.

name: Basic
description: Quality can be affordable. Despite being only 6mm thick the proven German quality of the Kronotex HDF core board and the world renowned AC3 wear layer delivers exceptional performance and moisture resistance. Ideal for rooms and offices with limited use.

name: Black Forest
description: XXXL Black forest laminate range, the longest , widest and quietest laminate available in South Africa. This Commercial grade laminate comes in a wide 239mm and long 2200mm plank, enhancing the pattern of the laminate making it look more natural. The quieter 12mm plank offers greater stability and sound absorption making this ideal choice for office and home.

name: Bohemian Classic
description: A new trend in interior decor.. recycled barn wood. The Bohemian Classic range is based on a current trend in interior decor where recycled barnwood is being repurposed for facades, furniture and floors. The distinctiveness of each piece is what makes these new items special; each one is unique. With our Bohemian Classic range this special type of wood has been matchlessly recreated using original found pieces from Pennsylvania, USA. Combined with tactile synchronous pores, the decor’s radiant authenticity embodies pure vibrancy and joie de vivre. You will find a number of different colours in each pack. It is recommended to lay out all of the floorboards before installation and sort them to ensure a varied, natural-looking floor pattern. You’ll be AMAZED by the results!!

name: Cavalier
description: Perfect for those seeking something new and adventurous… the natural, rugged look of the Cavalier range is assured to impress your friends and family alike!  With hues varying from light to dark your vision of an impeccably-floored home can now come true!

name: Domestic Elegance
description: Pergo – Domestic Elegance laminate flooring is specially designed for quicker and easier installation. Each piece simply locks directly into place, giving the same stunning aesthetic qualities as a traditional installation, but faster and without the need for adhesive. Thanks to our revolutionary Perfect Fold – 3D click system, as well as low maintenance and effortless cleaning for lasting beauty, now its possible to have a solid installation through an enhanced locking system. Pergo – Domestic laminate flooring is certified good environmental choice made from renewable resources.

name: Domestik AC3
description: Domestik is ideal for those who want a floor that is resistant to everyday knocks and spills, but don’t want to compromise on style.

name: Dynamic
description: DYNAMIC! A floor with which you can express your entire individuality. It can be used anywhere, is extremely resilient and above all else, offers a unique variety of patterns and hues. All this makes DYNAMIC the perfect floor for your ideas. Develop your full potential and live your life as you want to live it. And if you want, your DYNAMIC floor can move around with you. It can be easily removed and reinstalled somewhere else – even in medium used commercial areas.

name: Dynamic Plus
description: Floors have never before been this evocative and lively. DYNAMIC PLUS sparkles with extra dose of passion and esprit. This lines fresh, versatile decors will surprise and inspire you at the same time. DYNAMIC PLUS allows you to fully express your individuality while letting your creative run wild. Its astonishing versatility and strength make it the ideal all-rounder, also suitable for floors with heavy foot traffic. Without sacrificing either superb aesthetics or walking comfort.

name: Euro
description: Euro Laminate made in Germany by EGGER.This product is a market leader and offers excellent value for money. Inspired by nature, Euro Laminate is the perfect floor with the latest wood design to create a perfect setting.The latest European trends and décors bring functionality and aesthetics together in the design of interior spaces.

name: Euro Vision
description: Laminate flooring not only has an attractive appearance – the surfaces are also finished with a high-quality coating making it particularly easy to care for. A damp wipe or vacuuming is all it takes to keep laminate flooring clean and hygienic.EGGER laminate flooring is a floor covering for indoor use containing over 90% of the raw material wood. Due to the high proportion of wood material, the product is subject to natural changes in dimensions (shrinking and expanding) when climate conditions change. It is constructed using several components, which are permanently fused together using pressure and temperature (exception: DPR technology). The individual components are: wear layer, decorative paper, coreboard and balancer.Euro Vision is ideal for heavy domestic use & medium commercial use.

name: Evolution
description: The Evolution range provides a new level of realism. The mat surface, with authentic embossed glossy pore, faithfully reproduces the most exquisite features of premium quality timber to give your floor a natural look and feel.

name: Excellence
description: Floor panels that perfectly match your interior. The secure joints combined with a glossy wood structure give your floor a beautiful single-piece look.

name: Exquisit
description: Exqusit is a floor which is as noble and natural as wood. It is perfection itself, radiates warmth and comfort and is as pleasant to walk upon as solid wood. Its synchronized, embossed grain and the matt surface shimmer give it an authentic structure and create a warm, natural atmosphere, And the carefully milled V-groove also contributes to the typical, representative floorboard look.

name: Exquisit Plus
description: This brand’s decors feature a wide range of carefully selected, exquisite natural wood styles. There sublime, evenly embossed, subtly gleaming surfaces and virtually nature-identical grain drive home this collection’s perfection and exceptional quality. The extra-wide panels invite you to create elegant, spacious rooms with very special, warm feel-good ambiance. The precisely milled V-grooves are the finishing touch to this attractive, real looking plank floor.

name: Grandeur
description: Exuding pure luxury, this floor, fit for a castle, makes the most of every space. Its extra-long and wide planks do not only fit large areas and spacious lofts, they also look great in smaller rooms.Grandeur is an exclusive floor with an oak look. The matt-shiny laminate is virtually indistinguishable from solid parquet floor and radiates pure luxury. The long and wide planks with V-groove enhance the feeling of spaciousness and make Grandeur the perfect floor for your living room

name: Helio
description: You can see the contrast of matt and gloss in each board. The entirety gives a realistic look of oak boards painted with oil.

name: Impressio
description: The tough laminate from the Impressio collection, with decors ranging from light to dark, seems proof against the ravages of time. The planks are shorter and wider than standard laminate planks. The natural looking structure ensure a weathered, rugged look. The decors with Panoramic design flows from plank to plank, giving the impression of an endless look.

name: Inovar
description: The smooth finish on Inovar leaves a soft and silky sensation beneath your feet. Cool in summer but warm in winter, these laminates are an all-season flooring that should not go un-noticed/be overlooked.

name: Inspirations
description: Inspirations laminate range, the longest , widest and quietest laminate available in South Africa. This Commercial grade laminate comes in a wide 239mm and long 2200mm plank, enhancing the pattern of the laminate making it look more natural. The quieter 12mm plank offers greater stability and sound absorption making this ideal choice for office and home.

name: Kingsize
description: The KINGSIZE planks give every decor in this range the grand presentation it deserves and the extra wide planks reveal the natural beauty of wood.

name: KronoClik
description: FinFloor is excited to present their new German manufactured flooring range Kronoclik. KronoClick laminate flooring range is designed and manufactured to the highest European standards. Available in 8 unique colour specifically designed to be inline with current European trends this 8mm laminate flooring is available with or with out a V-groove.

name: Liberty
description:
Healthy: Produced to strict European norms. For a healthy living, emissions of vapours are the same as you would expect from wood in its natural state.Ecological: Made from suistanable wood from local sources – produced at the most modern, environmental friendly production facility of its kind.Resilient: Superior abrasion (cl. AC4/32), scratch- & impact resistance as well as colourfast (antifade).Waterresistant: Gives more than double the resistance to water than regular laminate floors.Residential warranty: 25 years
Commercial warranty: 2 years Only Available in Durban KZN

name: Living Expression AquaSafe
description: Pergo – Living Expression Aquasafe Modern Plank laminate flooring is specially designed for even quicker and easier installation. Each piece simply locks directly into place, giving the same stunning aesthetic qualities as a traditional installation, but faster and without the need for adhesive. Thanks to our revolutionary Perfect Fold – 3D click system, as well as low maintenance and effortless cleaning for long lasting beauty, now its possible to have a solid installation through an enhanced locking system. Pergo – Living Expression Aquasafe Modern Plank laminate flooring is certified good environment choice made from renewable resources.

name: Living Expression Long Planks
description: Pergo – Living Expression Long Plank laminate flooring is specially designed for even quicker and easier installation. Each piece simply locks directly into place, giving the same stunning aesthetic qualities as a traditional installation, but faster and without the need for adhesive. Thanks to our revolutionary Perfect Fold – 3D click system, as well as low maintenance and effortless cleaning for long lasting beauty, now its possible to have a solid installation through an enhanced locking system. Pergo – Living Expression Long Plank laminate flooring is certified good environment choice made from renewable resources.

name: Luna
description: Surprises with synchronic matching of surface texture and wood grain. The uniqueness is enhanced with a matt finish.

name: Mammut Plus
description: The best and more. This is the promise of the new decors of the MAMMUT PLUS collection from Kronotex. While exhibiting the same technical mastery as all the MAMMUT flooring, this new line offers you even more authenticity, an even larger choice of styles and even greater perfection. Apart from its incredible robustness and versatility, MAMMUT PLUS also raises the bar in other ways. Its extra-wide panels complement the existing extra-long and extra-sturdy versions of the MAMMUT family. And the decors seduce you with their elegantly authentic natural wood look, which can’t help but add posh country-style comfort to your home.

name: Night & Day
description: The smooth finish on Night & Day leaves a soft and silky sensation beneath your feet. Cool in summer but warm in winter, these laminates are an all-season flooring that should not go un-noticed/be overlooked.

name: Perfect Looks
description: As the names suggests, Perfect Looks is indeed the perfect flooring for your home or business.  As one of our favorites, this versatile laminate is wonderfully easy to maintain and offers to provide a hassle-free and perfect finish anywhere.

name: Prima Floor
description: Prima Floor is the ideal laminate flooring for today’s busy life. This KRONO ORIGlNAL® laminate flooring is lovely to look at, easy to care for and highly resistant to the scuffs and spills of everyday life.

name: Quattro Vintage
description: Quattro Vintage is a throwback to a time when wood dominated a home. Striking knots, grains and ember imperfections mimic aged wood creating a retro look. The collection is full of character and the accentuated grooves further enhance the effect. The addition of the 3D wood effect lights up and radiates warmth in any home. Quattro Vintage is a bold mix of old fashioned.

name: Route Des Vins
description: An artistic creation originating from a combination of the feel of historic trade routes with wine matured-in-wooden barrels. The high abrasion resistance class means the long-term conservation of its outstanding character.

name: Sparkle
description: Sparkle is the perfect laminate flooring for any occasion. This beautiful range of flooring is visually pleasing in any home with easy maintenance and a high scuff resistance. Furthermore, it offers a stress-free installation with stunning results.

name: Spotlight
description: A very attractive selection of colours lie within this range of laminates, assuring you of satisfaction in every room. Spoltlight has a slightly textured and eye-catching finish leaving you with outstanding results.

name: Super Natural Classic
description: The Super Natural Classic range provides a new level of realism. The matt surface, with Authentic Embossed glossy pore, faithfully reproduces the most exquisite features of premium quality timber to give your floor a natural look and feel.

name: Supreme AC3
description: Supreme flooring can be fitted throughout the home, offering an extremely durable, resistant flooring that is safe for your family. Supreme Laminates are stain resistant, abrasive and fade resistant, ensuring you years of use. The flooring can be fitted over most existing flooring, saving you time and money. Supreme Laminate Flooring is easily cleaned using a damp cloth, and therefore, more eco-friendly and economical in the long run.

name: Supreme AC4
description: Supreme AC4/32 range has Embossed grain with different depths – creates outstanding surface effects and contrasts. It has a high impact / wear resistance and is easy to maintain.

name: Supreme AC4 V-Grove
description: Supreme flooring can be fitted throughout the home, offering an extremely durable, resistant flooring that is safe for your family.

name: Time Out
description: This delightful laminate flooring range is a definite for anyone looking for a little more time to themselves.  With its low maintenance and simple installation you can be assured to be able to enjoy your new floors for that much longer!

name: Town and Country
description: With these warm and natural colours, the Town and Country laminate range is ideally suitable for any home.  Minimal maintenance and high scuff resistance makes this flooring a popular choice. So whether you’re a country bumpkin or a city slicker you can be sure these floors will make you feel right at home!

name: Tradition Sculpture
description: The look of real wood with beveled edges and the sawn cut marks left on its surface makes you love this floor down to its imperfections. Its hand-scrapped wood structure and the many ways in which the planks catch the light reflect pure craftsmanship, adding authenticity and character to your home.

name: Urbanflor
description: Urbanflor is the perfect response to the current trend of converting old factory buildings into lovely lofts. These industrial laminate floors are available in attractive timber designs with sawing effect that, once in place, resemble old, worn and seasoned wooden planks.

name: Variostep Classic
description: V-grooves for a spacious appearance. The Variostep Classic collection not only satisfies your demand for unmatched quality and easy installation. Its V-grooves also create the cosy look of a genuine solid hardwood floor. The grooves give your floor a unique and charming solid plank appearance as well as creating a sense of space. So if you’re looking to give your room a breathtaking new lease of life, you certainly won’t be disappointed.

name: Venus
description: Heralding a new generation of 3D laminated floors. The three dimensional effect guarantees an original and stylish complement to your interior. Flooring with that special something.

name: Vintage Classic
description: Since the traces of time are precious and beautiful, the vintage style will not only be in line with the current trend but will also give your home a special atmosphere. The Krono Original® Vintage Classic floor is the perfect basis for an exciting mix of old and new. The surface which appears to be sculpted by hand gives the floor a robust, uncomplicated elegance. Not only do old and new make for a perfect combination – but so do the “Vintage Classic“ and “Vintage Narrow“ floors, which can be laid in mixed widths together; allowing you to create a truly individual space.

name: Arlington
description: ARLINGTON features the ever popular clic system which allows for a glue-less installation. This sophisticated range of colours and textures allows the space you are working with to be brought to life. The contemporary tones allow for a diverse clientele that has always wanted to impress.

name: Charleston
description: CHARLESTON is a collection comprised of premium designs, which offers a combination of subtle wood designs together with more exotic wild textures. This collection showcases the beauty of natural timber, at a fraction of the cost. Each design is bound to transform your home into the haven you have always dreamt of. CHARLESTON is ideal for any residential application, and has added benefits of being water resistant and quiet under foot.

name: Classic 190
description: Traviloc Luxury Vinyl is 100% Waterproof with a cross weave fibre glass technology that is incorporated into each plank for superb dimensional stability. Our new locking system is 40% stronger than all our competitors. Traviloc has an Expansion / Contraction rate below 0,05% – more than 80% better than the requirements of European Standard EN 434.

name: Classic 220 Wide
description: Traviloc Luxury Vinyl is 100% Waterproof with a cross weave fibre glass technology that is incorporated into each plank for superb dimensional stability. Our new locking system is 40% stronger than all our competitors. Traviloc has an Expansion / Contraction rate below 0,05% – more than 80% better than the requirements of European Standard EN 434.SpecificationsGrade: T1Wear Layer: 0,5mm Ceramic Bead technologyEmbossing: IRE (Authentic woodgrain emboss)Warranty: Lifetime domestic/5 year commercialPanel Size: 1210 x 220 x 5mmBox Size: 1,86m2Edge treatment: Micro BevelledWeight of box: 19kgAcoustic data – 5db EN717-2 (ISO140-8)Traviloc is completely waterproof, requires no underlay and can be installed over most firm substrates. It is perfectly safe even in bathrooms, kitchens and other areas prone to moisture. Travi-Lay (underlay) is now approved for use with Traviloc range should it be requiredUsing the dramatic in-register emboss giving each plank an authentic woodgrain appearance.Traviloc solid vinyl flooring is a versatile, natural looking flooring suitable for all commercial, leisure, retail and domestic applications.Installation is noise, dust and odour free.Good slip resistance. •Excellent Chemical and Stain resistance.Traviloc is “Floor Score” certified for indoor air quality.A unique fibre glass Cross Weave technology is incorporated into each plank

name: Davenport
description: DAVENPORT is a combination of rustic tones and textures, which makes it the perfect product for any commercial installation that requires performance as well as aesthetic appeal. These latest colour and texture trends are not just for “show”, they are backed up by a 0,55mm wear layer which means it will perform in heavy commercial areas as well as look great in any trendy home.

name: Debutant
description: Debutant’s wood-look finish will be the envy of your guests!  The silky striations hold a beauty without comparison and its easy maintenance makes this LVT a must for you!

name: Discovery
description: Our Discovery LVT range is uniquely coloured with varying hues from dark to light,  This allows optimal choice when selecting floors for your new home.

name: Elegant Living
description: If you are looking for something “green”, Elegant Living LVT’s are eco-friendly and waterproof and are furthered with a long-life expectancy.

name: Flagship
description: If you are looking for something “green”, Flagship LVT’s are eco-friendly and water resistant as well as enhanced with a long-life expectancy.

name: Krono Xonic
description: Krono Xonic was subjected to long-term, comprehensive testing and we are proud of the results. These not only relate to quality and user-friendliness but with the vinyl itself, directly to its impact on the environment. Krono Xonic is entirely free of plasticizers and therefore can be fully recycled.

name: Luxury Click
description: EchoWood Luxury Click Vinyl flooring is available in a floating, click system that is easy to install. It requires no under layer and delivers a quick and hassle-free turnaround time. It can be installed over existing flooring, such as tiles and because it is a semi-permanent floor, it can be lifted and reinstalled in another area if required.

name: Luxury Glue Down
description: EchoWood Luxury Glue Down Vinyl flooring requires self levelling screed and a glue application for a permanent installation. Because the vinyl plank flooring is durable and moisture resistant, it can go anywhere.

name: Maddison
description: Maddison just oozes eccentricity!  These unique colours, accompanied with low maintenance are sure to please one and all!!

name: Nature Collection
description: COMO Luxury Vinyl features the industry’s best quality and technology. Our Nature Collection has a Natural Embossed surface as well as a 4 sided bevel edge to create a more authentic looking wood floor.

name: Nottingham
description: NOTTINGHAM features the revolutionary new TACBAC installation system, as well as the state of the art designs and shades that will transform any space that requires a wood look finish. The colour range is sophisticated but has the natural charm you would expect to find from authentic wooden floors.

name: Oakland
description: OAKLAND is the ideal range for any household. The whitewashed and grey designs emphasise the current trends worldwide. All colour ways depict a rustic and authentic look and with OAKLAND you have the benefit of the clic system whereby no glue is required during installation.

name: Podium Clic
description: Belgotex Floors’ addition to the Luxury Vinyl Tiles collection, PODIUM CLIC, is inspired by nature, and brings comfort and luxury into your home. PODIUM CLIC features a 360° clic system for easier installation and a Rigid Composite Board backing to resist the appearance of tile grout lines and allow fitting on uneven floors. With sound and water resistant qualities PODIUM CLIC can be used in any room in the home.

name: Portland
description: Natural raw timber is nature’s best décor gift to us. In our fast-paced modern world, there is nothing quite like the look and feel of genuine wood to reconnect us with our authentic selves and remind us of what is real. Wood completely transforms ‘functional’ into ‘beautiful’.Because we believe in the beauty of wood without the cost – to nature and your pocket – Belgotex Floors has launched ‘Portland’, a highly durable vinyl flooring plank range with an ultra-realistic wood look. It features a natural wood grain texture in straight, curly or wavy grain patterns, and even the occasional band-sawn effect, which adds warmth, depth and authenticity.Portland is durable and water-resistant, which means it’s great for bathrooms, kitchens and poolrooms, and the perfect floorcovering for a holiday beach home. It’s also easy to clean, quiet and comfortable underfoot. And the contemporary colour range will completely change the look and feel of your interior into a cool, natural environment – a place to reconnect with your authentic self.

name: Rococo
description: Rococo, the latest innovation by Van Dyck – is one of the most luxurious stick-down vinyl planks (LVTs) on the market. This range, in stylish colours and designs has bevelled edges and is suitable for heavy commercial and residential use. The planks are larger than usual at 178 by 1219mm, making this range easy and quick to install, as well as proving a stylish and contemporary look.

name: Rococo Parquet
description: Bringing Tradition Back To The Future

name: Rococo Wide Plank
description: Contemporary interiors made easy with Rococo Wide Plank

name: Series 200
description: The ultimate in economy and efficiency.Sweep or mop the floor occasionally to keep clean. Add the relatively economical cost to install and you have one of the best flooring solutions around.Usage is ideal for business building, malls, hospitals, factories, school, gymnasiums, supermarkets and office space.

name: Series 250
description: For a long lasting solution, the answer to commercial applications where style, aesthetics, quietness, ease of maintenance and cost-effective solutions are found in the series 250.Usage is ideal for business building, malls, hospitals, factories, school, gymnasiums, supermarkets and office space.

name: Series 400
description: Choose a floor that reflects your style.Available in trendy and modern designs adding value and class to any interior.Usage is ideal for business building, malls, hospitals, factories, school, gymnasiums, supermarkets and office space.

name: Series 500
description: The Series 500 is an incredibly realistic-looking floor that is aimed at low maintenance.Designed to look like real wood, LVT does not only look like the real thing but feels like it to thanks to the IRE (In registered embossing texture) available in the Series 500.The Series 500 is ideal for corporate buildings, malls, hospitals, factories, schools, gymnasiums, supermarkets and office space or areas.

name: Symphony EVP
description:
Symphony EVP (Engineered vinyl planks) is emerging as one of the most popular flooring categories today. With EVP flooring gaining so much popularity, many people are asking what it is, and why it is so popular.So, what is EVP?
EVP is a considered a composite material, that is 100% waterproof, rigid and stable. EVP products are commonly referred to as engineered vinyl plank, luxury vinyl flooring or waterproof vinyl.The glue-less locking system makes installation easy. The engineered core is made from virgin material to ensure the quality of the final product – stable and hazard free Symphony EVP flooring is formaldehyde free and contributes to improved indoor air quality. Symphony Engineered Vinyl plank flooring leaves a lower carbon footprint; requires less maintenance and is more recyclable.

name: Trio-Loc
description: TRIO-Loc vinyl flooring are extremely water resistant and can be used throughout the home, even in rooms previously out of bounds to wooden flooring. Now you can incorporate the beautiful natural grain of wood in bathrooms and laundry rooms without the risk of damaging the wood. Working on a free floating floor with a licensed Unilin Click system, the easy installation requires little or no preparation to the sub-floor and can be installed on almost any hard level surface.

name: Vitality
description: The beautiful, rich colouring of Vitality is one of the best LVT ranges with its easy maintenance and anti-bacterial properties.  Also with Vitality being slip and scratch resistant, water resistant as well as sound proof, this is a definite winner!

name: Windermere Collection
description: The Como Windermere Collection has an Embossed-In-Register surface (with the pressed surface being synchronized with the design) as well as a 4 sided bevel edge to create a more authentic looking wood floor.

name: Crystal
description: CRYSTAL is sustainable, durable, functional and versatile, which makes it the perfect collection for professionals. Made from polyvinyl chloride, with a foam backing on a glass fibre mat support, it is the ideal solution for use in healthcare, retail, offices, hospitality, leisure and many more heavy commercial areas. The waterproof qualities of this range ensure that cleaning up is a breeze, and the antibacterial top coat provides protection against the germs.

name: Hartford
description: HARTFORD is purpose-adapted to applications required to provide indentation resistance and good sound insulation. Made from polyvinyl chloride, with a foam backing on a glass fibre mat support, this range is sustainable, durable, functional and versatile. HARTFORD is well suited to any heavy commercial environment, such as healthcare, retail and hospitality. The waterproof qualities of this range ensure that cleaning up is a breeze, and the antibacterial top coat provides protection against the germs.

name: Toledo
description: The raw beauty, natural appeal and unique nuances of the oak tree have inspired a remarkable range of cushion vinyl flooring from Belgotex Flooring, called Toledo. This innovative vinyl product is the perfect choice for a contemporary setting. Offering a smooth, fashionable surface, Toledo is durable, water-resistant, and a convenient, practical flooring solution for kitchens, bathrooms, living rooms. Because cushion vinyl is scratch-resistant and slip-proof too, it’s perfect for young families with children – and for grandparents too! And because one of its best features is the comfortable soft feel that it gives underfoot, cushion vinyl has the added benefits of comfort and luxury that you cannot get from any other floor tile.Toledo is available in an extensive range of stylish colours and finishes, based on a variety of Oak timbers, which give this quality product an even more realistic wood look and feel, and will transform your home into an enchanting modern setting.

name: Trip Tech Wood
description: Belgotex Floors brings South Africa yet another first… a 3m wide cushion vinyl range, to reduce wastage during installation. TRIPTECH WOOD with its resilient foam backing ensures top-flight appearance retention and a bounce back feel. Sophisticated and elegant designs with strong performance, now that is POWER. You will have no worries about scuffing and staining thanks to its protective PU topcoat. That means a floor that retains its fresh new look far longer.

name: Versatile
description: VersaTile is a semi-flexible vinyl tile supplied in a 2.00mm and 2.5mm thickness and 300mm x 300mm in size, with a PU layer and manufactured to specifications EN654. The material is suitable for heavy commercial applications and must be fully bonded and installed as per the SANS 10070 code of practice for the installation of resilient thermoplastic and similar flexible floor covering materials, in conjunction with the Belgotex/Gerflor installation recommendations.

name: Damask
description: Made from 100% recycled content, these 50 x 50 cm carpet tiles can be used as accents on the wall or ceiling; and offers unlimited design flexibility. They are easy to install, clean and maintain; and they also come with an added benefit of improving indoor air quality and acoustics.

name: Feature Walls
description: Made from 100% recycled content, these 50 x 50 cm carpet tiles can be used as accents on the wall or ceiling; and offers unlimited design flexibility. They are easy to install, clean and maintain; and they also come with an added benefit of improving indoor air quality and acoustics.

description: Made from 100% recycled content, these 50 x 50 cm carpet tiles can be used as accents on the wall or ceiling; and offers unlimited design flexibility. They are easy to install, clean and maintain; and they also come with an added benefit of improving indoor air quality and acoustics.

description: Made from 100% recycled content, these 50 x 50 cm carpet tiles can be used as accents on the wall or ceiling; and offers unlimited design flexibility. They are easy to install, clean and maintain; and they also come with an added benefit of improving indoor air quality and acoustics.

description: Made from 100% recycled content, these 50 x 50 cm carpet tiles can be used as accents on the wall or ceiling; and offers unlimited design flexibility. They are easy to install, clean and maintain; and they also come with an added benefit of improving indoor air quality and acoustics.

description: Made from 100% recycled content, these 50 x 50 cm carpet tiles can be used as accents on the wall or ceiling; and offers unlimited design flexibility. They are easy to install, clean and maintain; and they also come with an added benefit of improving indoor air quality and acoustics.

description: Made from 100% recycled content, these 50 x 50 cm carpet tiles can be used as accents on the wall or ceiling; and offers unlimited design flexibility. They are easy to install, clean and maintain; and they also come with an added benefit of improving indoor air quality and acoustics.

name: Teens
description: Made from 100% recycled content, these 50 x 50 cm carpet tiles can be used as accents on the wall or ceiling; and offers unlimited design flexibility. They are easy to install, clean and maintain; and they also come with an added benefit of improving indoor air quality and acoustics.

name: Typography
description: Made from 100% recycled content, these 50 x 50cm carpet tiles can be used as accents on the wall or ceiling; and offers unlimited design flexibility. They are easy to install, clean and maintain; and they also come with an added benefit of improving indoor air quality and acoustics.

name: Colour Grass
description: Busy, stressed homeowners are opting for the instant, evergreen convenience of DuraTurf artificial grass from Belgotex Floors. Perfect for landscaped lawns, terraces or to green over dull boring patches where real grass just won’t grow – think courtyards or balconies, pavers or gardens, under the swings or jungle gym – DuraTurf is a fabulous foundation that blurs the lines between indoors and out. The new COLORGRASS range in six bright colours including blue, green, red, brown, turquoise and grey, is ideal to transform playgrounds or playrooms with a safe, synthetic surface that’s suitable for children and pets.

name: Country Club: Fairway Green
description: DURATURF provides endless creative landscaping solutions for the home and commercial environment. It is ideal for creating low-maintenance lawn effects in deep-shade areas, around pools, water features and pavers adding colour and underfoot softness to cement-screened areas. Constructed out of durable, tufted yarns, DURATURF is available in a range of pile heights, and is suitable for multiple applications.

name: DIY Turf: Spring Green
description: DURATURF provides endless creative landscaping solutions for the home and commercial environment. It is ideal for creating low-maintenance lawn effects in deep-shade areas, around pools, water features and pavers adding colour and underfoot softness to cement-screened areas. Constructed out of durable, tufted yarns, DURATURF is available in a range of pile heights, and is suitable for multiple applications.

It is ideal for creating low-maintenance lawn effects in deep-shade areas, around pools, water features and pavers adding colour and underfoot softness to cement-screened areas. Constructed out of durable, tufted yarns, DURATURF is available in a range of pile heights, and is suitable for multiple applications.

name: Kensington
description: Van Dyck’s budget high quality Easi – Kensington range is a favourite for larger areas where a crisp but natural look is required.

name: Knightsbridge
description: Feels soft under paws and is a favourite with the pets.

name: Lawn Plus: Gem
description: DURATURF provides endless creative landscaping solutions for the home and commercial environment. It is ideal for creating low-maintenance lawn effects in deep-shade areas, around pools, water features and pavers adding colour and underfoot softness to cement-screened areas. Constructed out of durable, tufted yarns, DURATURF is available in a range of pile heights, and is suitable for multiple applications.

name: Mayfair
description: Van Dyck's elite Easi – Mayfair is almost maintenance free and used by some of the highest profile homes and companies throughout the world.

name: Oval: Olive Green
description: DURATURF provides endless creative landscaping solutions for the home and commercial environment. It is ideal for creating low-maintenance lawn effects in deep-shade areas, around pools, water features and pavers adding colour and underfoot softness to cement-screened areas. name: Soccer
description: Available for the back garden for your aspiring footballers.

name: Sport
description: Specially picked for the sports enthusiast.

name: Tempo: Envy
description: DURATURF provides endless creative landscaping solutions for the home and commercial environment. It is ideal for creating low-maintenance lawn effects in deep-shade areas, around pools, water features and pavers adding colour and underfoot softness to cement-screened areas. Constructed out of durable, tufted yarns, DURATURF is available in a range of pile heights, and is suitable for multiple applications.

name: BKB Lifestyle
description: The perfect Parquet. BKB Parquet-engineered wood is made from sustainable fibre and is suitable for heavy-duty applications. Commercial and residential warrantees range from 10 to 20 years. This range of distinctive finishes make BKB perfect for any business or home.BKB is crafted using French Oak with a Bona Traffic top layer to ensure maximum strength. BKB is a 3 ply, 14mm engineered wood floor with a 3.5mm solid top layer. All BKB products are finished with 6 quotes of UV hardened lacquer and a BONA traffic coating for extra durable strength. LOC system on the floor ensures ease of installation.BKB only uses French Oak for extra stability and quality assurance.

name: FinOak
description:
Specifications – HDF CoreFinOak comes unfinished with a 2mm wire brushed European Oak Rustic top face, on-top of a 7mm HDF core and a 1mm pine backer for greater dimensional stability. Fits together with a Licensed drop down valinge glue-less joining system.
Warranty: 25 years Limited Residential warranty.Specifications – Multilayer Core (FSC CERTIFIED)FinOak comes unfinished with a 3mm wire brushed European Oak Rustic top face, on-top of a 10mm Multilayer core and a 1mm pine backer for greater dimensional stability. Fits together with a Licensed drop down valinge glue-less joining system.
Warranty: 25 years Limited Residential warranty.

name: Woodline Parquetry
description: Woodline Parquetry is available in a variety of sizes and finishes.Finishes include: Smoked, vertical grain, antique, marina, rustic, reclaimed, oiled, lacquered, matt, unfinished, distressed, weathered,fumed, brushed, hand-painted and hand-scraped.Pannel sized vary from: 2130 x 240 x 15mm, 1820 x 190 x 15mm / 1820 x 145 x 15mmBenefits of a Hevea core: Hevea is stronger than Spruce,Pine or Poplar. This greater board density offers enhanced dimensional stability and can better withstands external pressure such as temperature, moisture and air changeWarranty: 25 years Limited Residential warranty

name: Constantia Shutters
description: Please note that Constantia Shutters are only available in the greater Durban Area at the moment and selected Gauteng stores.White Teak: A medium density timber with a fine, smooth grain and as such is ideal for shutters. It has a high strength to weight ratio and exceptional natural resilience, giving an excellent resistance to knocks and bumps.The timber carries a Forest Stewardship Council certificate which ensures that the timber is planted and harvested in an environmentally appropriate manner.Phoenixwood: A medium density timber with a more pronounced grain and texture. As with White Teak above, it also carries a Forest Stewardship Council Certificate. Phoenixwood is an ideal timber when used as shutters and blinds.Artwood: Artwood is a man made product made from extremely tough and durable materials called Acrylonitrile Butadiene Stryene (ABS). It is completely waterproof and recommended for areas of dampness and high humidity. The louvres have a cellular structure which creates pockets of air, providing a very high level of thermal resistance.Custom Craft: Custom Craft is a man made product manufactured from a combination of timber fibres and glue. It is extruded with a poloypropylene coating to give smooth, durable and even finish. It is dimensionally very stable and hard wearing.We offer a wide standard range of rich stains and paint colours. a total colour offering of 50 is available. Colours range from lustrous wood stains through to fashionable whites and greys.All Colours are UV treated to ensure that the colour is protected from the damaging of the sun rays.

name: Aluminium Blinds
description: Aluminium Venetian Blinds – Classically modern – a smart choice!The extremely popular Aluminium Venetian Blind offers superior light control with a sleek, modern look. Slats can be adjusted to let in just the right amount of light and the entire blind can be raised or lowered as desired.Aluminium is durable and never goes out of style, making this a practical and cost-effective option. These blinds are available in a huge variety of textures and can be customized to fit large and small windows.

name: Bamboo Blinds
description: Beautiful bamboo provides a natural ambience, in a range of designs tailored to meet your needs. Made from bamboo, jute and wood, these blinds blend perfectly into modern and traditional styles, filtering light to add a warm glow.Bamboo blinds can be designed as roll-up panel or Roman fold, with a solid integrated wooden head rail to ensure durability and ease of use. Woven wood blinds using the finest West African Mahoganies and European hardwoods are also available.

name: Motorized Blinds
description: Motorized Blinds – offering you the ultimate in simplicity, safety and style.With the advantage of modern technology and home automation, you are able to take complete control of all of your window coverings from virtually any room in your home or office.All motorized blinds are controlled from either a handheld remote control , or a wall-switch. This makes it possible to raise, or lower your blinds in just a click of a button. Motorized shades can also be used in conjunction with a sun sensor and can be lifted or lowered according to the sun’s intensity.Motorized blinds are perfect solution for when the blinds are too heavy to lift, or when the blinds are in a hard to reach place. They are also perfect for when there are children in the house, and there are too many cords hanging from windows.

name: Roller Blinds
description: Roller blinds are an attractive, practical and cost-effective window dressing solution. These blinds are easy to operate and are available in a wide range of fabrics and colours, from block-out through to light-diffusing fabrics and even lace, to complement the style and décor of any room.Roller blinds can be effective alone or with fringes, tassels and other décor, and are operated using a simple spring roller or chain control system and are easily automated. They can be tailor made for interior or outdoor use.

name: Vertical Blinds
description: Vertical Blinds – The perfect balance between light and privacy.Perfect for your home or office, vertical blinds are an elegant and cost effective option for sliding doors and large windows. They can be pulled back to reveal beautiful views or rotated to allow light in while still providing privacy, and also offer excellent insulation from outside heat. Vertical blinds are easy to clean and maintain and are available in a variety of colours and textures, adding a classy finishing touch to any room .

name: Wood Venetian Blinds
description: Wood Venetian Blinds – Luxurious, contemporary elegance.Add the warmth and natural elegance of wood to your windows, in a range of shades and slat widths to match your décor and furnishings. Wood Venetian Blinds are suitable for homes and offices, and are made to measure, ensuring that they fit your windows perfectly. Blending warmth with a natural, sleek style, Wood Venetian Blinds are the ideal finishing touch for any room. Wooden Venetian Blinds can be motorised too.
